entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING ENDED, Mayo
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:41 AM MST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 14 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 14 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 10 February 2023
